Text.Page:
I could give Shalim more personal instruction if I wasn't always worried about being attacked by giants.

They're vicious and come out of nowhere!

If you kill some {@LinkCreature:34#1000#icecleaver giants}, I'll make time to tutor Shalim, but I won't risk his life just to ease his boredom.

Your skill shames mine, . I am glad the federation has soldiers like you out here.

Thanks for thinning out the giants. Shalim will be elated!
If the giants are eliminated, the miners will benefit greatly. Everyone prospersâ€”except the giants.
